img_above_text:
# Skandha of Form
Skandha of Form is one of the first Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong you will find. But, you won't be able to use it for the majority of the game until you collect the other Skandha Key Items throughout the chapters.
_"Man shrinks at odor, but smiles at beauty, which is only natural. Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed"_.

The item is shown in the game's inventory screen, highlighting its unique appearance and description. The preceding text explains that the Skandha of Form is one of the first key items players will find but cannot use immediately, as it requires collecting other Skandha items throughout the game. The item is described as a treasure with a secret yet to be revealed, once hidden inside the Buddha's head. The image serves to visually introduce the Skandha of Form and its mysterious significance in the game's narrative.
